thread.title: Four Blues named in EA SPORTS FC Team of the Year! | News | Official Site | Chelsea Football Club
thread.title_full: Four Blues named in EA SPORTS FC Team of the Year! | News | Official Site | Chelsea Football Club

title: Four Blues named in EA SPORTS FC Team of the Year! | News | Official Site | Chelsea Football Club
text:
Cole Palmer has been named in the Men’s EA SPORTS FC Team of the Year, while Lauren James, Guro Reiten and Lucy Bronze are all included in the Women’s side.
Released annually, the Team of the Year builds a squad of the best-performing players in the world from over the past 12 months, with special TOTY Player Items now available in EA SPORTS FC 25 and FC Mobile.
Some stunning performances in Chelsea blue from Palmer over the past 12 months saw him make the final XI from the original shortlist of over 70 players, while our Chelsea Women’s trio have also made the cut for their fine displays.
The EA SPORTS FC Team of the Year is chosen by the fans , with special cards celebrating each player's status as a fan favourite. The items are now live in EA SPORTS FC 25.
The men’s team in full is: Emi Martinez (Aston Villa); Dani Carvajal (Real Madrid), Virgil van Dijk (Liverpool), William Saliba (Arsenal), Alex Grimaldo (Bayer Leverkusen); Rodi (Man City), Jude Bellingham (Real Madrid), Cole Palmer (Chelsea) ; Mo Salah (Liverpool), Kylian Mbappe (Real Madrid), Vini Jr (Real Madrid)
The women’s team in full is: Ann-Katrin Berger (Gotham); Lucy Bronze (Chelsea) , Wendie Renard (Lyon), Irene Paredes (Barcelona), Sakina Karchaoui (PSG); Alexia Putellas (Barcelona), Aitana Bonmati (Barcelona), Guro Reiten (Chelsea) ; Lauren James (Chelsea) , Sophia Smith (Portland Thorns), Caroline Graham Hansen (Barcelona).
Congratulations Cole, Guro, Lauren and Lucy!
